intro: Clutia pubescens, commonly known as the hairy clutia, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Rubiaceae. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of Africa, Asia, and the Pacific. Clutia pubescens is often used in traditional medicine for its purported healing properties.
